title: [K-12] Blended Continuing Education Program for Strengthening Nursing Professional Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Bachelor’s degree in nursing and basic clinical practice experience
context.additional_context: A short-term expert-focused course operated by a graduate language education center, emphasizing the strengthening of immediately applicable practical competencies in clinical settings

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the latest clinical guidelines related to patient safety with over 90% accuracy in online modules
By the workshop’s conclusion, participants achieve a score of 4 or higher (on a 5-point scale) in simulation-based communication skills via peer evaluation
Within two weeks of completing the training, learners engage in at least three instances of professional knowledge sharing with peers in online communities

resources: Access Permissions for LMS (Learning Management System) Platforms

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
